name: DXC Technology Company
description: DXC Technology Company is a leading global technology services provider that specializes in digital transformation, IT services, and consulting. Formed in 2017 from the merger of Computer Sciences Corporation (CSC) and the Enterprise Services segment of Hewlett Packard Enterprise, DXC serves clients in various industries, including healthcare, financial services, manufacturing, and public sector. With a focus on innovation and customer-centric solutions, DXC utilizes advanced technologies such as cloud computing, data analytics, artificial intelligence, and cybersecurity to help organizations navigate their digital journeys. The company’s extensive portfolio includes application services, cloud services, workplace and mobility services, and security solutions, all designed to enhance operational efficiency and drive business growth. DXC operates in over 70 countries, empowering clients to adopt new technologies and improve their business models while reducing costs. Committed to sustainability and corporate responsibility, DXC aims to create a positive impact through its services and community engagement. The company continues to evolve, investing in emerging technologies and strategic partnerships to stay ahead in the rapidly changing technology landscape.
